array.name: lValues
array.item: Our Rock-a-Billy Goat blend espresso blended with steamed milk.
Our house blend espresso blended with milk chocolate and steamed milk.
Our house blend espresso blended with Ghirardelli white chocolate and steamed milk.
Iced Coffee cold brewed and triple strained!
Our house blend espresso pulled and added to our fresh brewed house coffee.
Our house blend espresso blended with steamed half and half.
Our house blend espresso poured over hot water...lighter in body and acidity than house coffee but bold in flavor.
We use David Rio Tiger Chai! Creamy, sweet and spicy!
Hershey\'s syrup and steamed milk...also available with White chocolate...topped with marshmallows or whipped cream.
Any flavor syrup you want mixed with steamed milk.
Mix any flavor syrup with Hershey\'s chocolate and steamed milk.
Tastes like an Andes Mint candy!
Peppermint Panda Mocha. Chocolate and Peppermint...tastes like a Yorkshire Peppermint Patty.
Tastes like an almond biscotti! Lite chocolate, almond, vanilla and Macadamia Nut.
Yes, the one Starbucks made famous...Lite Vanilla syrup, espresso, steamed milk, topped with thick velvety foam and a caramel drizzle!
Brown Sugar and Cinnamon syrups blended with espresso, steamed milk, topped with whipped cream, caramel drizzle and cinnamon powder!
White Chocolate, Caramel, Banana and Butter Rum topped with Nutmeg.
4 shots of espresso, chocolate, white chocolate, caramel and a splash of cream.
Montana Tea and Spice Co. Teas.
A blend of RA base mixes, cold brewed house espresso, milk and syrups.
Whole, Skim, Half and Half, Soy or Almond.
